## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G11310](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G11310)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SOAR1</u>
- **Gene Name:** suppressor of the ABAR overexpressor 1
- **Description:**   Pentatricopeptide repeat (PPR) superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
